reviews.text: This is a small, simple hotel in a great location with car parking at the front. A few minutes walk from the fish restaurants and the old town. It's also has easy access to motorway and coast road.
reviews.title: great location

reviews.text: Can recommend fernando fish restaurant. The hotel staff were very pleasant and helpful and the continental breakfast had everything we needed. (breads, cheese, ham, fruit, cereal, yoghourt..) It is excellent value and we'd stay here again.
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel with great location!
Great Hotel with great people!!
reviews.text: The Albergaria Solaris was inexpensive and quite comfortable. The hotel is in a great location for walking to dinner, shopping, sight-seeing, and even beaches if you walk to the ferry and go to Troia (you can see dolphins from the ferry!). The rooms are simple and comfortable with A/C and refrigerators and the bathrooms have shower/tub combos. The staff is very polite and professional. Breakfast was quite diverse and included fruit, cereal, scrambled eggs and of course, breads, from 7-10am. There was quite a lot of TV in English. The hotel is right on a plaza where young people hang out at all hours, that with a lot of traffic noise makes it hard to sleep, if that kind of thing bothers you like it does me, with the window/doors open, but with the windows closed and the A/C on it was no problem. We made a joke of our very large room key fob and called it our gas station bathroom key. We really loved the Albergaria Solaris and would happily stay there again.

reviews.title: Setubal and the area arround
reviews.text: I spent there 3 weeks, and it was really amazing! All the people in this nice hotel were excelent! Near by Albergaria Solaris you have so so so nice restaurants, with grilled fish, try "o Conv??s", it's the best there!!
